title: A unitary scenario for particle-black hole scattering?
abstract: The process of particle capture by an extremal charged black hole followed by Hawking radiation is believed not to preserve unitarity at one-loop level. In this paper we point out that the above standard picture can be altered due to backreaction effects. In the semiclassical approximation, and for the special low-energy particle-hole scattering considered, the corrected Hawking radiation seems compatible with unitarity.
